resources.string: You can always say \"Stop\" to end the tutorial
Double press the Oculus button to speak.
Let\'s practice a couple of voice commands. Double press the Oculus button on your right controller to get started.
Voice Commands tutorial is available in Home. Please exit the app and try again.
Try again. Double press the Oculus button.
Take photos and videos with your voice.

You can activate Voice Commands with the wake word, \"Hey Facebook.\" When the \"Hey Facebook\" setting is enabled and your mic is on, Oculus will listen for the wake word.\10\10Enabling this feature may affect the performance of some apps. You can turn it off at any time in Experimental Features Settings. You can still use Voice Commands without the wake word by double pressing the Oculus button.
To use \"Hey Facebook,\" click Enable and restart your device.
This tutorial will take around 2 minutes.
Let\'s try out your first Voice Command.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Headers should be separated using \';\' and key/value should be separated using \',\'

If you enable improvements, keystroke data will be stored on your device, and only aggregated modeling information from your device will be shared with Facebook to improve the keyboard experience for everyone. \10\10You can always turn off keyboard improvements in your device settings.

You can activate Voice Commands with the wake word, \"Hey Facebook.\" When the \"Hey Facebook\" setting is enabled and your mic is on, Oculus will listen for the wake word. \10\10Enabling this feature may affect the performance of some apps. You can turn it off at any time in Experimental Features Settings. You can always use Voice Commands without the wake word.
There was an error activating voice commands.
Microphone is turned off in Settings. Please enable to use this service.
You can turn on In-App Voice Commands in Device Settings > Voice Commands
This app is blocking your microphone. Please try again after you close it.
You must accept the privacy policy before using dictation.
Turn up the volume to use voice commands.
Voice Commands are unavailable because your microphone is muted.
Dictation is unavailable because your microphone is muted.
Turn On Your Microphone To Use Voice Commands
Turn On Your Microphone To Use Dictation
Sorry, Voice Commands is an experimental feature currently in beta and is not yet available on this device.
It is always available in Home.
\"Hey Facebook\" has been temporarily turned off in this app
Click the voice commands button in the universal menu to start a voice command.
Setup is complete. You can double press the Oculus button to start a voice command.
Use your voice to navigate, control your device, and find new apps and games. Voice Commands is an experimental feature that will get smarter over time.

When you use Voice Commands, we store a recording and transcription on our servers and may review them to improve our voice services. You can view, hear and delete any of your voice interactions in Device Settings > Voice Commands > Voice Activity.\10\10\10If you turn off storage, you’ll still be able to use Voice Commands. You can always manage Voice Commands storage in Settings. Learn more by visiting the Voice Commands FAQs on the Oculus Support website or by selecting “Learn More” in the Store Voice Commands settings description.

When you use Voice Commands, we store a recording and transcription on our servers and may review them to improve our voice services. You can view, hear and delete any of your voice interactions in Device Settings > Voice Commands > Voice Activity.

If you turn off storage, you’ll still be able to use Voice Commands. You can always manage Voice Commands storage in Settings. Learn more by visiting the Voice Commands FAQs on the Oculus Support website or by selecting “Learn More” in the Store Voice Commands settings description.
Allows the app to broadcast launch requests and commands
Allows the app to display assistant related UI feedback.
When you\'re done for the day, try saying \"Turn off\"
Your last dictation will be saved, transcribed and sent to a trained reviewer to improve voice services. We protect your privacy by changing the pitch of your voice.
Thanks for submitting feedback. We appreciate your help improving our voice services.
We appreciate your help improving our voice services.

Use dictation to type faster with your voice. If you don’t use dictation, you can still type with your controllers.\10\10 Your voice data will not be recorded or stored without your permission. Learn more by visiting the Voice Dictation FAQs on the Oculus Support website.
Sample the tones and select a voice for Oculus.
Now you can select a voice for Oculus.
To access Voice Selection, please complete the Voice Commands tutorial.
